name: Survival Is Our Resistance
description: The game SIOR (Survival Is Our Resistance), is a Top Down Shooter in 2D, which aims to survive as long as possible against the growing hordes of zombies, canceling more and more points and earning more coins at the end of each game. Use the scenario to your advantage, or get power ups when killing zombies, evolve characters, evolve weapons, buy new characters and weapons, try your best, but you will always die!
